actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: Relating to the tariff treatment of certain cloth used in the fabrication of articles for use in public or private religious observances.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment to certain shan or mien cloth used in the fabrication of articles for use in public or private religious observances, whether or not imported for the use of a religious institution.

titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of certain cloth used in the fabrication of articles for use in public or private religious observances.
